title: Strengthening Business Practical Skills: Improving Scientific Writing Quality through Technology-Based Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Research Methodology and Writing Experience in the Field of Science
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can systematically evaluate peers’ draft scientific papers using technological tools.
Learners enhance the clarity and logical coherence of research reports by 20% or more through feedback-based writing improvements.
Learners execute a three-stage (planning-execution-reflection) collaborative assessment process on digital platforms while measuring learning effectiveness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
